title: Trudeau ENDS 'Back the Blue!' Canadian Gestapo TURN on Own Citizens
description: Canada's mounted police put an end to blindly backing the blue. We'll explain how, but it involves an old lady being trampled by horses. We also dive into the latest between Russia and Ukraine. And John Oliver said some dumb CRT things that need debunking.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
